DOC.brief_summary: Low testosterone condition occur body unable produce sufficient quantity testosterone . The medical name low testosterone hypogonadism . Hypogonadism cause many factor . Symptoms include : decrease libido , lack energy mood swing . The goal testosterone replacement therapy return testosterone level normal range relieve symptom .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetic ( PK ) parameters testosterone administration TSX-002 ( easy swallow testosterone capsule ) hypogonadal men . This determine blood sampling specify time study . The study also intend evaluate PK parameter testosterone metabolite , dihydrotestosterone ( DHT ) , well safety tolerability TSX-002 . The study consist three ( 3 ) period , TSX-002 take orally various dos . Study duration approximately 9 week .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic hypogonadal male subject ( Testosterone > 100 < 300 ng/dL , two separate 10 sample one week apart ) , 1870 year old , Willing able provide inform consent participate 3 period study . BMI < 35 kg/m2 . Malabsorption condition ( e.g . history cholecystectomy , Inflammatory Bowel Disease , Pancreatitis , Celiac disease , Sprue , Dumping syndrome , Bariatric surgery ; Short bowel syndrome , Lactose intolerance ) ; Alcoholics substance abuse ; Gastroparesis ; IPSS ( International Prostate Symptom score ) > 19 ; PSA ( prostatespecific antigen ) > 4 ng/ml ; Congestive Heart Failure , uncontrolled ( NYHC > 1 ) ; Uncontrolled sleep apnea ; Topical injectable testosterone replacement therapy ( kind include dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) nutritional supplement ) within past 4 week ; Testopel exclude within 2 year ; Aveed exclude within past 6 month ; Hematocrit > 50 .
